Many to one 3D vector send

[thrower~] is a wrapper for pdâ€™s built in [throw~]. Internally, it creates three unique catchs based on the symbol argument provided on creation. For example, foo-x foo-y foo-z. Any number of [thrower~] objects can add into one [catcher~] object. But each [catcher~] must have a unique name.

Inlets

Outlet Data Type Return
1 signal x
2 signal y
3 signal z

Outlets

none

Arguments

Arg Data Type Use
1 symbol name to throw to

Alias

none
